input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 70'' in. Lighted Faux Eucalyptus Garland'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 24-In. Wreath and 6-ft. Garland Set'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Boxwood Decorative Garland with Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6ft. Colorado Fir Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 Multicolored LED Lights, Berries and Pinecones'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with 35 LED Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Artificial Garland with Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Hilaree 9ft Flocked Christmas Garland with LED Lights (Set of 2)'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 14" Pre-Lit White Valley Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Perego Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Hydrangea Garland with Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 144'' in. Lighted Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Crestwood Spruce Garland'
  - Name='SAFAVIEH Faux 28" Snowy Pine LED Garland with Ornaments'
  - Name='Snowy Ming Pine Garland'
  - Name='Best Choice Products 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 70'' in. Lighted Faux Eucalyptus Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are pre-lit artificial garlands intended for decoration, but the reference product is pine-based while this is eucalyptus, which differs in branch style and traditional Christmas connotation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 24-In. Wreath and 6-ft. Garland Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes a garland but only 6 feet long and paired with a wreath; likely similar in function but smaller size and combined product reduces direct comparability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Boxwood Decorative Garland with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same 9-ft length, pre-lit with warm white LED lights, and boxwood garland is similar in function and style, though different foliage type from pine.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6ft. Colorado Fir Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 Multicolored LED Lights, Berries and Pinecones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir-based artificial Christmas garland with pinecones and lights, but 6 ft length and multicolored lights differ somewhat from 9 ft and warm white LEDs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with 35 LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Christmas garland like reference, but fewer lights and unspecified foliage type reduces similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Artificial Garland with Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same 9 ft length, pre-lit artificial garland, very similar features though foliage specifics unknown.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Hilaree 9ft Flocked Christmas Garland with LED Lights (Set of 2)
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 9 ft pre-lit garland similar in size and lighting, but flocked finish differs from natural pine look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 14" Pre-Lit White Valley Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also pre-lit pine garland approximately 9 ft long, very close in plant type and lighting setup, making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Perego Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir-based artificial Christmas garland similar in plant type to reference's Norwood Fir base, though lighting details not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Hydrangea Garland with Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit 9 ft garland with warm white lights matches length and lighting but hydrangea foliage differs greatly from pine, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 144'' in. Lighted Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A 12 ft lighted garland similar in concept and features to reference, though longer length and unspecified foliage lower exact match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Crestwood Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and similar spruce based Christmas garland likely similar style and use, making it very relevant to the reference pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SAFAVIEH Faux 28" Snowy Pine LED Garland with Ornaments
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine LED garland with snowy effect and ornaments similar in foliage and function, but shorter and with added ornamentation.
Pine garland with snowy effect similar in style but no mention of lights, so less relevant to the pre-lit aspect.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same 9 ft length pre-lit Christmas garland; details about foliage not provided but likely similar function and construction.
